last_episode_to_air.name: The Spirit of Freedom
last_episode_to_air.overview: In the late twenties, Ireland is in the midst of war. Towns and villages have been devastated, house raids strike fear into the population and hundreds of Republicans have been arrested. Despite having tens of thousands of troops on the ground, much of the countryside becomes ungovernable for the British as rebels step up armed attacks.

name: The Irish Revolution
overview: The remarkable story of the Irish War of Independence (1919-1922) which resulted in the formation of the Irish Free State and became the model for other British colonies to gain their independence.

seasons.name: Miniseries
seasons.overview: The remarkable story of the Irish War of Independence (1919-1922) which resulted in the formation of the Irish Free State and became the model for other British colonies to gain their independence.

tagline: 100 years ago… a small group of Irish rebels begin to imagine the impossible…

episodes.name: We Lived in Dreams
episodes.overview: How a small group of rebels forced Britain to withdraw after centuries of conquest and misrule.

episodes.name: That the Nation May Live
episodes.overview: In 1919, the pro-independence Sinn Féin party wins and an independent parliament, the Dáil Éireann, is created. As the number of IRA militants grows, violence escalates throughout the country.

episodes.name: The Spirit of Freedom
episodes.overview: In the late twenties, Ireland is in the midst of war. Towns and villages have been devastated, house raids strike fear into the population and hundreds of Republicans have been arrested. Despite having tens of thousands of troops on the ground, much of the countryside becomes ungovernable for the British as rebels step up armed attacks.
